name: Arctic SH
description:
Main part of this game was made by following online cources.

Parts i made entirely myself:

  1. Ammo system
  2. Grenade launcher gun
  3. Weapon switching system
  4. Additions to enemy AI for it to be able reload and switch weapons based on different situations
  5. Switching between levels when player kills every enemy on level
  6. Main menu with abbility to change game resolution

*In this project i used Paragon Assets that was made by Epic Games
